post:
Mothership1 is a new and innovative cloud platform for virtual machines, storage, and applications.

* For a limited time, we are offering a $50 Free Credit for a month
* CHECK BACK LATER FOR A NEW PROMO – No Obligation

Mothership1 offers many enhanced features compared to existing cloud offerings:

* A Private enterprise-class firewall dedicated to you only
* Offering superior security capabilities and extended control over traffic routing within your virtual infrastructure.
* Virtual Machine deployment in under 5 seconds with immediate Snapshots & Rollbacks.
* PRICE! Virtual Machines start at $5.00 USD/Month. S3 Storage starts at $0.03/GB/Month.

*Thanks all for signing up, the was a lot of interest. We have reached the goals for this promotion and will get back soon with more actions!*

This is a limited time offer and will be granted on a first-come first-serve basis.
